name: The Simpsons 138th Episode Spectacular
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Jon Vitti, Dan Greaney (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Troy McClure hosts a retrospective of the first 137 episodes of The Simpsons.
